TopicTitle: Returning from Mun (Accurate shoot for the Kerbin)

Articles.Content: How to make a very accurate shooting for Kerbin i mean a direct intersect with Kerbin, I always miss and had to spend extra fuel to get back to the Kerbin.
Always return opposite to the Mun\'s orbit. Patched conics will tell you what to do.

Always return opposite to the Mun\'s orbit. Patched conics will tell you what to do.

Ok, here we go. I\'m a noob. So, I\'ve said it. What are patched conics?

Ok, here we go. I\'m a noob. So, I\'ve said it. What are patched conics?

Patched conics show your trajectory after you change a SOI (Sphere of Influence). For example when you are on the Mun and you burn to return to Kerbin your trajectory on the current SOI will be blue. Your trajectory after you change your SOI will be yellow. Thats patched conics.

I am not too good with explanations sorry about that :-[
Oh, now I get it. Thanks. Always thought that it was a part or something. Maybe I\'ve missed something in the name, my english isn\'t very good
